column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: According to the Anti-Drug Department

column12: apartment DIAMOND HOME 1 rented by the men.------As a result

column17: holding passport number M717071112 “Has an arrest warrant issued by the International Police (Red Cross).”------2-Name is CHOI MIN YOUNG
column22: and equipment for packaging and concealment of some drugs.------Currently
